name: High School Couple Makeover
description:
Dress up and make up a teenage girl for a romantic first date, then pick an outfit, a hairstyle and facial features for the boy, too. Or, if you feel more like it, style these cute young lovers for a typical college day: in high school uniforms, jackets, shirts and such. Give the schoolgirl a smart, geeky look, like they'd go into math or computers. Or pick a more formal style for an ambitious student type which plans a career in business. Or put together a cool glam look of a popular girl in the class, with trendy clothes, fancy hairstyles and unusual accessories worthy of a prom queen. Dressing up the boyfriend is as fun as the girlfriend with a stylish selection of garments. Design great outfits for the cute model and her crush.

Press the "Camera" button to grab screenshots of your fashion designs, then share the pictures with your friends to show off your fashionista talents!
